Posts.Content: I was a newbie back in April of this year. I was scared and in shock for 2 weeks. I have since had a mastectomy and 4 rounds of A/C chemo. I have 4 rounds of Taxol and then radiation. Life goes on and this is TEMPORARY!!!! I'm 35 and have a young daughter and wonderful husband. You will survive!!!
Posts.Title: A newbie
